subject: Marathon Running
Running
lead_paragraph: Ryan Hall, a 25-year-old from Southern California, finished fifth in 2:06:17, the second-fastest marathon run by an American. The winner, Martin Lel of Kenya, set a course record.
snippet: Ryan Hall, a 25-year-old from Southern California, finished fifth in 2:06:17, the second-fastest marathon run by an American. The winner, Martin Lel of Kenya, set a course record.
